body_html: Thanks for your thoughts, @jonasrauber! I do agree that it can be useful in many settings, but by not being prescriptive in the API, we intentionally force users to explicitly think about exactly what variables they want to warm-start, and whether or not it is appropriate for their task. Does that make sense?

body: Thanks for your thoughts, @jonasrauber!  I do agree that it can be useful in many settings, but by not being prescriptive in the API, we intentionally force users to explicitly think about exactly what variables they want to warm-start, and whether or not it is appropriate for their task.  Does that make sense?
